## QueryFilter.has() method

Check whether there's a filter for the provided name or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
has(name: string): boolean;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name of the field. |

<b>Returns:</b>

A boolean value.
